alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Hendry, northwest Broward and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 631 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Montura to near Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal. Movement was north at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Okeelanta, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Miccosukee Service Plaza and West Broward Rec. Area On Alligator Alley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
